author: altair9732
content: just curious, if i send out 2 (A and B) transactions with different nonce, let's say 2 and 3, and also with gas fee of 70 gwei and 80 gwei respectively, which one would be mined first, so would miners prioritize the gas fee or the evm prioritize the nonce

author: pietjepuk
content: There's no choice there for a miner. The one with 2 has to be included first.

author: altair9732
content: i use infura as a web3 provider, but it keeps closing each time, what other free choice would be better

author: pietjepuk
content: This really is a server for discussion on research and development of the base Ethereum protocol. Those questions are probably better suited for Ethereum stackexchange, or say the r/ethfinance daily.
